Arizona Christian University: Rankings

Updated: February 29, 2024

EduRank

Arizona Christian University ranked 1467th in the United States, 5539th in the global 2024 rating, and scored in 14 research topics. Arizona Christian University ranking is based on 3 factors: research output (EduRank's index has 188 academic publications and 1,384 citations attributed to the university), non-academic reputation, and the impact of notable alumni.

Ranking Category #5539 of 14,131 In the World #1551 of 2,597 In North America #1467 of 2,496 In the United States #9 of 25 In Arizona #2 of 6 In Phoenix #5903 of 6,199 For Geology #6037 of 6,493 For Sociology #6112 of 6,537 For Law #6805 of 7,738 For Alumni Impact #4683 of 14,131 For Non-academic Prominence
